# Draft:Akshat Tiwari

----
Akshat Tiwari is an Indian actor, writer, and director. He is known for his performances in theatre, brand advertisements, and short films. Tiwari is also a student of physics at the National Institute of Technology (NIT), Surat, where he actively participated in dramatics and creative productions.
Early Life and Education
Akshat Tiwari is originally from Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh. He completed his early education at Puranchandra Vidyaniketan in Kanpur. He is currently graduating from the National Institute of Technology (NIT), Surat, where he serves as the head of the dramatics club and has been actively involved in theatre and performance arts.
Career
Tiwari began his acting journey through college theatre and gradually moved into screen work. He has performed and directed short films, written scripts, and appeared in commercial advertisements.
He appeared in a brand advertisement for Rare Rabbit, a popular fashion brand.
In 2025, he wrote, directed, and played the lead role in the independent film Rakhtt, which explores psychological and dramatic themes. He also contributed a small written segment to the Bollywood film Raid 2, expanding his presence in mainstream cinema.
Notable Works
* Rakhtt (2025) – Independent short film – Written, directed, and led by Akshat Tiwari
* Raid 2 – Contributed a written segment
* Rare Rabbit Ad – Appeared in a commercial advertisement
